column1: Iraq's postal system was rededicated May 24
column2: 2004. All international Iraqi mail is routed through the International Service Center (ISC) facility
column3: located at the Baghdad International Airport. The new 2004 system utilizes five digits that correspond to the Region
column4: governorate as well as the post office within that governorate. In
